name: Triangulum (reck-it warehouse)
description:
Triangulum is a fast paced, timing based 2D platformer. The game features tight, responsive controls, and a difficulty that will bring you back to good old days when games didn't hold your hand to beat them.

*******************************************************************************************

Key Features:

*Fast paced, you better keep moving! The floor will literally fall out from beneath you!

*Flying through spikes, and lasers!

*Wall climbing, ceiling running, and slope riding excitement!

*Difficulty that will make you want to smash your head through a desk at times.

*******************************************************************************************

Please note this game is still in early access, I am still actively developing this game
